import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "../styles/Haul.css"; // HERO IMAGES import hero1 from "../assets/images/hero/hero1.jpg"; import hero2 from "../assets/images/hero/hero2.jpg"; import hero3 from "../assets/images/hero/hero3.jpg"; import hero4 from "../assets/images/hero/hero4.jpg"; import hero5 from "../assets/images/hero/hero5.jpg"; const heroImages = [hero1, hero2, hero3, hero4, hero5]; const Haul = () => { const [currentImage, setCurrentImage] = useState(0); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentImage((prev) => (prev + 1) % heroImages.length); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); return (
{/* ================= HERO ================= */}

Experts in Flatbed & Specialized Hauling

Industry-leading flatbed trucking solutions for oversized, heavy, and time-critical freight.

{/* ================= INTRO ================= */}

Industry-Leading Flatbed Trucking Company

RGM has built a strong reputation as a trusted flatbed carrier, operating a modern fleet of late-model trucks and 53-foot air-ride flatbed and step-deck trailers. Our equipment minimizes cargo damage and delays, while our experienced drivers ensure secure, on-time delivery across the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

{/* ================= SERVICES ================= */}

Flatbed Freight Services

USA Domestic Freight Services
Canada Freight Services
Mexico Freight Services
Over-Dimensional Flatbed Freight
General Carriage Rules
{/* ================= WHAT IS FLATBED ================= */}

What Is Flatbed Freight?

Flatbed shipping is ideal for cargo that is oversized, heavy, or does not require an enclosed trailer. Flatbed and step-deck trailers allow easy loading and unloading while accommodating a wide range of cargo shapes and sizes. Common flatbed freight includes construction materials, machinery, metals, tires, and industrial equipment.

▶ Flatbed Shipping – Watch Now
{/* ================= BENEFITS ================= */}

Benefits of Flatbed Shipping with RGM

  • Adaptable, personalized shipping solutions across North America
  • 100% company trucks & drivers for greater load control
  • Trailer pools to reduce downtime and improve scalability
  • Cross-border expertise for USA, Canada & Mexico
  • Impeccably maintained late-model fleet
  • Strong safety performance ensuring consistent delivery
{/* ================= MORE THAN FLATBED ================= */}

RGM Ships More Than Flatbed

While flatbed freight is our specialty, RGM also supports multimodal logistics solutions. From LTL to specialized freight, our logistics team can design custom transportation strategies for your business.

{/* ================= EQUIPMENT ================= */}

Our Flatbed Shipping Equipment

  • 53′ air-ride flatbeds & step-deck trailers
  • Up to 48,000 lbs payload capacity
  • Advanced securement, tarps & dunnage
  • Well-trained drivers with extensive securement training
  • Modern fleet reduces breakdowns and delays
{/* ================= RATE MY LOAD ================= */}

Meet the “Rate My Load” Program

Our drivers provide direct feedback after every delivery, helping us improve loading conditions, communication, and overall efficiency. This driver-driven insight strengthens customer relationships and service quality.

{/* ================= AWARDS ================= */}

Recognized for Excellence

RGM is proud to be recognized for safety, service quality, and innovation in transportation. These honors reflect our commitment to our customers, drivers, and partners.

Military Friendly Employer Top 100 For-Hire Carriers Veteran Employer Champion Safety Excellence Awards
{/* ================= FINAL CTA ================= */}

Move Your Freight with Confidence

Get a fast, competitive flatbed freight quote today and experience professional hauling with RGM.
